title: Bu Erduo De Gushi
synopsis: The cartoonist gave the protagonist in the comic a nice name, Bu Er. Bao Hulu struggled hard for his ideals and bread in his semi-underground studio. One day, when he woke up, he found that he had moved into the comics he had created. Although Bao Hulu wanted to return to reality, things were not so easy. In his cartoon world, a series of strange things happened to Bao Hulu and his characters Bu Er, Cake Tou and others... (translated from iqiyi)
